meanings.sent1: The library hosted a gathering of talented prosaists for a reading event.
meanings.sent2: Many famous authors are known as prosaists for their novels and short stories.
meanings.sent3: The prosaists at the writing workshop shared their favorite writing tips.
meanings.sent4: Her pen danced across the page like a skilled prosaist crafting a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: In the world of literature, prosaists are the architects of captivating stories.

meanings.definition: The practice or skill of writing prose.
meanings.sent1: His dedication to improving his prosaists paid off with the publication of his first book.
meanings.sent2: Studying the prosaists of renowned authors can help aspiring writers develop their own style.
meanings.sent3: The workshop focused on enhancing the prosaists of the participants through writing exercises.
meanings.sent4: She approached writing with the precision of a prosaist carefully selecting each word.
meanings.sent5: The art of prosaists involves weaving words together to create vivid imagery for readers.
